mapper.sql: org_id AS id, org_name AS name, org_code AS code, org_address AS address, org_legal AS legal, org_phone AS phone
mapper.update: update org set org_code = #{code}, org_name = #{name}, org_address=#{address}, org_legal=#{legal},org_phone=#{phone} where org_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from org where org_code = #{code} or org_name = #{name}
